en.title: Jump To The Field
en.text1: NNK is based on the effort of individual activists that every year go to the field and work to support People on the Move across Greece, Serbia, Bosnia, Montenegro and Melilla. The actions takes place in in sensitive environments, where frustration often derived in tensions among refugees and locals.
en.text2: Volunteers are in the middle. Working conditions are stressful and challenging. PoM might express grudge when feeling discriminated, while locals might be frustrated by the chaotic situation, and it requires self-responsibility and maturity, as everything that volunteers do on the field influence on how the locals perceive other volunteers and NNK overall.
en.text3: If you feel ready to join the move, check the requirements below and fulfill the form. NNK receives many applications, so be patient, and weÂ´ll contact you.

messageSent.title: You message has been sent
messageSent.msgSent:
Thank you for writing us.
We'll contact you as soon as possible.
